successes.title: LaMetric - Customizable Smart Ticker for Life and Business
successes.description: Hackable, real-time smart display: receive and act on notifications, tasks, workout timers, business metrics, emails, news and more!

Pledges.description: HALL OF FAME: You will receive our awesome updates and will be front and center in our Hall of Fame on our website as a massive thank you for believing in us!

SUPER EARLY BIRD PLUG-IN LAMETRIC -  This level is for those who get in quick and want the best deal! 
Get The Plug-in LaMetric(without battery) at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch. Free shipping to the continental US.
EARLY BIRD PLUG-IN LAMETRIC -  Get The Plug-in LaMetric(without battery) at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch! Free shipping to the continental US.

SUPER EARLY BIRD BATTERY LAMETRIC - This level is for those who get in quick and want the best deal! Get The Battery LaMetric(with built-in Lithium-ion, rechargeable battery) at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch! Free shipping to the continental US.
KICKSTARTER SPECIAL PLUG-IN LAMETRIC - Get The Plug-in LaMetric(without battery) from the first full batch of production! Free shipping to the continental US.

EARLY BIRD BATTERY LAMETRIC - Get The Battery LaMetric(with built-in Lithium-ion, rechargeable battery) at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch! Free shipping to the continental US.
KICKSTARTER SPECIAL BATTERY LAMETRIC - Get The Battery LaMetric(with built-in Lithium-ion, rechargeable battery) from the first full batch of production! Free shipping to the continental US.

SUPER EARLY BIRD LIFE&BUSINESS SET - This level is for those who get in quick and want the best deal!  Get one Plug-in LaMetric  and one Battery LaMetric at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch! Free shipping to the continental US.
EARLY BIRD LIFE&BUSINESS SET -  Get one Plug-in LaMetric and one Battery LaMetric at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch! Free shipping to the continental US.
KICKSTARTER SPECIAL LIFE&BUSINESS SET - Get one Plug-in LaMetric and one Battery LaMetric from the first full batch of production! Free shipping to the continental US.
PLUG-IN DASHBOARD SET – Get three plug-in LaMetrics (no battery) to get more information at a glance. Free shipping to the continental US.
BATTERY DASHBOARD SET – Get three battery  LaMetrics to get more information at a glance. Free shipping to the continental US.

YOUR WIDGET - Let us create a custom widget precisely to your specifications! Send us your ideas and we'll implement a widget just for you, integrated with the system you need. You'll also receive LIFE&BUSINESS SET (one Plug-in LaMetric and one Battery LaMetric).
